trans-unit.source: Applying the optional <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute" /> to an XML Web service sets the default format of SOAP requests and responses sent to and from XML Web service methods within the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 將選擇性的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute" /> 套用於 XML Web Service，來設定傳送往返於 XML Web Service 內 XML Web Service 方法之 SOAP 要求和回應的預設格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute> allows you to set the default formatting styles for XML Web service methods within an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute>可讓您設定的預設格式樣式，在 XML Web 服務中的 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: If an individual XML Web service method must change these defaults, apply a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> to that XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 如果個別的 XML Web 服務方法必須變更這些預設值，套用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>該 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: Web Services Description Language (WSDL) defines two styles for how an XML Web service method, which it calls an operation, can be formatted in a SOAP request or a SOAP response: `RPC` and `Document`.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 定義的方式執行 XML Web service 方法，它會呼叫作業，可以格式化的 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應中的兩種樣式：`RPC`和`Document`。

trans-unit.source: Exactly how the individual message parts is determined by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.Use%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.ParameterStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 個別訊息部分由方式<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.Use%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.ParameterStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.Use%2A> property determines whether parameters are formatted `Encoded` or `Literal`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.Use%2A>屬性會決定參數是否格式化`Encoded`或`Literal`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.ParameterStyle%2A> determines whether the parameters are encapsulated within a single message part beneath the `Body` element, or whether each parameter is an individual message part.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.ParameterStyle%2A>判斷參數是否都封裝於單一訊息部分下方`Body`項目，或是否每個參數都是個別訊息部分。

trans-unit.source: To set the default method level formatting to `RPC`, apply a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcServiceAttribute> to the class implementing the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定預設的方法層級格式`RPC`，套用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcServiceAttribute>來實作 XML Web 服務的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more details, see [[\<topic://cpconCustomizingSOAPInASPNETWebServicesWebServiceClients>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d777288-c0d9-4e6a-b638-f010da031952).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \<topic://cpconCustomizingSOAPInASPNETWebServicesWebServiceClients >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d777288-c0d9-4e6a-b638-f010da031952)。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be applied to a class implementing an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以套用至類別實作 XML Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute" /> class setting all properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，將所有屬性設定為它們的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The parameter formatting of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: XML Web Service 的參數格式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.Use" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.Use" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute" /> class setting the parameter formatting.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，設定參數格式。

trans-unit.source: The parameter formatting style.
trans-unit.target: 參數格式化樣式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.Use" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.Use" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether parameters are encapsulated within a single XML element, under the <see langword="Body" /> element, in SOAP messages sent to and from XML Web service methods within the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 設定參數是否封裝於單一 XML 項目中，在 <see langword="Body" /> 項目底下，傳送往返於 XML Web Service 內的 XML Web Service 方法中。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.ParameterStyle" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute.ParameterStyle" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute" /> class that sets the parameter formatting and sets whether parameters are encapsulated within a single XML element, under the <see langword="Body" /> element, in SOAP messages.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，設定參數格式並設定參數是否封裝於單一 XML 項目中，在 <see langword="Body" /> 項目底下、SOAP 訊息中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default setting that controls whether parameters are encapsulated within a single element following the <see langword="<Body>" /> element in the XML portion of a SOAP message for XML Web service methods of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定預設設定，控制參數是否封裝於單一項目 (在 XML Web Service 之 XML Web Service 方法的 SOAP 訊息 XML 部分中的 <see langword="<Body>" /> 項目之後) 中。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle" /> for SOAP requests and SOAP responses to and from XML Web service methods within the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 要求和 SOAP 回應的預設 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle" />，其在 XML Web Service 內往返於 XML Web Service。

trans-unit.source: If not set, the default is <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle.Wrapped" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有設定，預設是 <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle.Wrapped" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how SOAP messages are routed to the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 SOAP 訊息如何傳送至 XML Web Service。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServiceRoutingStyle" /> that represents how SOAP messages are routed to the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServiceRoutingStyle" />，表示 SOAP 訊息如何傳送至 XML Web Service。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServiceRoutingStyle.SoapAction" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServiceRoutingStyle.SoapAction" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default parameter formatting for an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML Web Service 的預設參數格式。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse" /> for the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: XML Web Service 的預設 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse" />。

trans-unit.source: If not set, the default is <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse.Literal" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有設定，預設是 <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse.Literal" />。

trans-unit.source: The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) defines two formatting styles for parameters sent to and from XML Web services: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse.Encoded> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse.Literal>.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 會定義兩種格式樣式，XML Web service 來回傳送的參數：<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse.Encoded>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse.Literal>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse.Encoded> refers to formatting the parameters using the SOAP encoding outlined in the SOAP specification in section 5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse.Encoded> 是指格式使用 SOAP 規格第 5 節中所述的 SOAP 編碼方式的參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse.Literal> refers to formatting the parameters using a predefined XSD schema for each parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse.Literal> 是指格式使用預先定義的 XSD 結構描述每個參數的參數。

trans-unit.source: For more details, see [[\<topic://cpconCustomizingSOAPInASPNETWebServicesWebServiceClients>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d777288-c0d9-4e6a-b638-f010da031952).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \<topic://cpconCustomizingSOAPInASPNETWebServicesWebServiceClients >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d777288-c0d9-4e6a-b638-f010da031952)。
